CutSceneText.Text: you must pass through all the portals within the time limit.
The first portal is behind me...
then down and through the second, below the circle tower.
After that, you'll pass through four more tower portals,
and rise up to the high tower at the center of the temple.
Fly through the last portal at the top of the spire, and return to me.
Only a skilled flyer can pass this test,
so get plenty of practice before you begin.
